resources.string: Best battery saving. Least automatic data updates.
Normal operation during the day, battery saving at night.
Device syncs without restriction. No battery saving.
Create your own battery saving profile.
Phone syncs without restrictions throughout the day.

"When phone isn't connected to a charger:


Stops syncing data after 15 mins inactivity (day and night).


Dims the display."

"When phone isn't connected to a charger:


Stops syncing data after 15 mins inactivity in off-peak hours (10:00 PM - 5:00 AM). Syncing resumes when you press a button.


Syncs without restrictions in peak hours."

"When phone isn't connected to a charger:


Stops syncing data after 15 mins inactivity in off-peak hours (22:00 - 05:00). Syncing resumes when you press a button.


Syncs without restrictions in peak hours."
Custom mode gives you full control over the battery-saving features of your phone. These settings only apply while the device is not charging.
If battery level < 30%, set display brightness to:

This mode may disconnect your mobile data connection after a period of inactivity, during which time the phone will not sync any data.

When the connections are severed, streaming media playback will be interrupted.
Display brightness is now auto-controlled by the light sensor
What has been using the battery
Off-peak hours set to 22:00 - 05:00 to improve your battery life.
Battery manager set to night-time saver mode

The battery manager is set to Night-time saver mode in order to conserve battery.

Night-time saver will turn off your data connections after 15 minutes of inactivity between 10:00 PM and 5:00 AM, when the device is not connected to a charger.

When the data connections are turned off, your device will not sync or play back streaming media.

To change this behaviour, press "Configure" now or visit the Battery manager in All apps.
